name: ULTIMATE JOUST GAMES!!!
description:
Welcome to the Ultimate Jousting Games! Enter the arena and dominate the other Jouster! Either play against the computer or your friend that is sitting right next to you eating your last bag of Cheetos!!

This game is in the early concept stage and I would love to hear your thoughts on the game so far! I plan on adding more:

  1. Characters
  2. Jousting Lances
  3. Arenas Platforms
  4. PUNISHMENTS
  5. In-Game Secrets

MAY THE BIGGEST STICK WIN!!!
